result.reason: The Main Menu toolbar position is not persisted in user settings, unlike other toolbars. This causes the menu to reset to the top position on every application restart, preventing users from customizing their workspace layout permanently.
result.approach: Add MainMenuLocation and MainMenuParentDock properties to Settings. Update SettingsSaver.SaveSettings to persist the msMain position and SettingsLoader.LoadSettings (AddMainMenuPanel) to restore it, defaulting to 'Top' if not set.

attempts.raw_output:
